original_text: You may take the young, but be sure to let the mother go, so that it may go well with you and you may have a long life.
korean_text: 어미는 반드시 놓아 줄 것이요 새끼는 취하여도 되나니 그리하면 네가 복을 누리고 장수하리라

sentences.original_text: but be sure to let the mother go
so that it may go well with you
and you may have a long life
